race.name: Kenku
race.age: Kenku have shorter lifespans than humans. They reach maturity at about 12 years old and can live to 60.

names.list: Smasher, Clanger, Slicer, Basher, Rat Scratch, Whistler, Mouser, Growler, Sail Snap, Hammerer, Cutter

feature.name: Mimicry
feature.shortDescription: You can mimic sounds you have heard, including voices. A creature that hears the sounds you make can tell they are imitations with a successful Wisdom(Insight) check opposed by your Charisma(Deception) check.

feature.name: Expert Forgery
feature.shortDescription: You can duplicate other creatures' handwriting and craftwork. You have advantage on all checks made to produce forgeries or duplicates of existing objects.
